00046 // internal macro, usage: EVCB.beginSend(...)
00047 #define EVCB  ev.suppress_notifications ? (void)0 : ev
00048 
00067 #define ev  (*cSimulation::getActiveEnvir())

00069 
00084 #define EV  ev.isDisabled()?ev:ev   /*Note: deliberately NO parens*/

00101 class SIM_API cEnvir
00102 {
00103     friend class evbuf;
00104   public:
00105     // Internal flag for express mode.
00106     bool disable_tracing;
00107 
00108     // Indicates whether eventlog recording is currently enabled
00109     bool record_eventlog;
00110 
00111     // Internal flag. When set to true, the simulation kernel MAY omit calling
00112     // the following cEnvir methods: messageScheduled(), messageCancelled(),
00113     // beginSend(), messageSendDirect(), messageSendHop(), messageSendHop(),
00114     // messageSendHop(), messageDeleted(), moduleReparented(), simulationEvent(),
00115     // componentMethodBegin(), moduleCreated(), moduleDeleted(), connectionCreated(),
00116     // connectionDeleted(), displayStringChanged().
00117     bool suppress_notifications;
00118 
00119     // Internal flag. When set, cRuntimeError constructor to raises an exception.
00120     bool debug_on_errors;
00121 
00122   protected:
00123     // further internal vars
00124     std::ostream out;
00125 
00126   protected:
00127     // internal: ev.printf() and ev<< eventually ends up here; write the first n characters of string s
00128     virtual void sputn(const char *s, int n) = 0;
00129 
00130     // internal: pop up a dialog with the given message; called from printfmsg()
00131     virtual void putsmsg(const char *msg) = 0;
00132 
00133     // internal: ask a yes/no question, throws exception if cancelled; askYesNo() delegates here
00134     virtual bool askyesno(const char *msg) = 0;
00135 
00136     // internal: flushes the internal stream buffer by terminating last line if needed
00137     void flushLastLine();
00138 
00139   public:
00142 
00146     cEnvir();
00147 
00151     virtual ~cEnvir();
00153 
00156 
00163     // note: this cannot be pure virtual, because it has to work even after ev was disposed of
00164     virtual void objectDeleted(cObject *object) {}
00165 
00169     virtual void componentInitBegin(cComponent *component, int stage) {}
00170 
00178     virtual void simulationEvent(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00179 
00193     virtual void messageSent_OBSOLETE(cMessage *msg, cGate *directToGate=NULL) = 0;
00194 
00199     virtual void messageScheduled(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00200 
00205     virtual void messageCancelled(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00206 
00214     virtual void beginSend(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00215 
00217     virtual void messageSendDirect(cMessage *msg, cGate *toGate, simtime_t propagationDelay, simtime_t transmissionDelay) = 0;
00218 
00220     virtual void messageSendHop(cMessage *msg, cGate *srcGate) = 0;
00221 
00223     virtual void messageSendHop(cMessage *msg, cGate *srcGate, simtime_t propagationDelay, simtime_t transmissionDelay) = 0;
00224 
00226     virtual void endSend(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00227 
00232     virtual void messageCreated(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00233 
00238     virtual void messageCloned(cMessage *msg, cMessage* clone) = 0;
00239 
00245     virtual void messageDeleted(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00246 
00250     virtual void moduleReparented(cModule *module, cModule *oldparent) = 0;
00251 
00258     virtual void componentMethodBegin(cComponent *from, cComponent *to, const char *methodFmt, va_list va, bool silent) = 0;
00259 
00264     virtual void componentMethodEnd() = 0;
00265 
00271     virtual void moduleCreated(cModule *newmodule) = 0;
00272 
00284     virtual void moduleDeleted(cModule *module) = 0;
00285 
00289     virtual void gateCreated(cGate *newgate) = 0;
00290 
00295     virtual void gateDeleted(cGate *gate) = 0;
00296 
00301     virtual void connectionCreated(cGate *srcgate) = 0;
00302 
00307     virtual void connectionDeleted(cGate *srcgate) = 0;
00308 
00313     virtual void displayStringChanged(cComponent *component) = 0;
00314 
00319     // Note: this may not be pure virtual, as it may get called even after main()
00320     // exited and StaticEnv was destructed, and we do not want to get a "pure virtual
00321     // method called" error
00322     virtual void undisposedObject(cObject *obj) {}
00324 
00327 
00333     virtual void configure(cComponent *component) = 0;
00334 
00339     virtual void readParameter(cPar *parameter) = 0;
00340 
00351     virtual bool isModuleLocal(cModule *parentmod, const char *modname, int index) = 0;
00352 
00375     virtual cXMLElement *getXMLDocument(const char *filename, const char *xpath=NULL) = 0;
00376 
00398     virtual cXMLElement *getParsedXMLString(const char *content, const char *xpath=NULL) = 0;
00399 
00413     virtual void forgetXMLDocument(const char *filename) = 0;
00414 
00427     virtual void forgetParsedXMLString(const char *content) = 0;
00428 
00438     virtual void flushXMLDocumentCache() = 0;
00439 
00449     virtual void flushXMLParsedContentCache() = 0;
00450 
00455     virtual unsigned getExtraStackForEnvir() const = 0;
00456 
00464     virtual cConfiguration *getConfig() = 0;
00465 
00471     virtual cConfigurationEx *getConfigEx();
00473 
00481     virtual bool isGUI() const = 0;
00482 
00498     bool isDisabled() const {return disable_tracing && !record_eventlog;}
00499 
00504     // implementation note: needed because otherwise the templated version
00505     // would cause ambiguity errors in some cases
00506     cEnvir& operator<<(const std::string& t) {out << t; return *this;}
00507 
00519     template<typename T> cEnvir& operator<<(const T& t) {out << t; return *this;}
00520 
00524     cEnvir& operator<<(std::ostream& (t)(std::ostream&)) {out << t; return *this;}
00525 
00530     std::ostream& getOStream() {return out;}
00531 
00536     virtual void bubble(cComponent *component, const char *text) = 0;
00537 
00542     virtual void printfmsg(const char *fmt,...);
00543 
00554     // note: non-virtual, delegates to sputn()
00555     virtual int printf(const char *fmt,...);
00556 
00563     virtual cEnvir& flush() = 0;
00564 
00568     virtual std::string gets(const char *prompt, const char *defaultreply=NULL) = 0;
00569 
00575     // note: non-virtual, delegates to askyesno()
00576     virtual bool askYesNo(const char *fmt,...);
00578 
00581 
00586     virtual int getNumRNGs() const = 0;
00587 
00591     virtual cRNG *getRNG(int k) = 0;
00592 
00597     virtual void getRNGMappingFor(cComponent *component) = 0;
00599 
00609 
00617     virtual void *registerOutputVector(const char *modulename, const char *vectorname) = 0;
00618 
00622     virtual void deregisterOutputVector(void *vechandle) = 0;
00623 
00627     virtual void setVectorAttribute(void *vechandle, const char *name, const char *value) = 0;
00628 
00634     virtual bool recordInOutputVector(void *vechandle, simtime_t t, double value) = 0;
00636 
00646 
00650     virtual void recordScalar(cComponent *component, const char *name, double value, opp_string_map *attributes=NULL) = 0;
00651 
00656     virtual void recordStatistic(cComponent *component, const char *name, cStatistic *statistic, opp_string_map *attributes=NULL) = 0;
00658 
00666 
00670     virtual std::ostream *getStreamForSnapshot() = 0;
00671 
00675     virtual void releaseStreamForSnapshot(std::ostream *os) = 0;
00677 
00683     virtual int getArgCount() const = 0;
00684 
00688     virtual char **getArgVector() const = 0;
00689 
00693     virtual int getParsimProcId() const = 0;
00694 
00699     virtual int getParsimNumPartitions() const = 0;
00700 
00704     virtual unsigned long getUniqueNumber() = 0;
00705 
00719     virtual bool idle() = 0;
00721 };

00731 class SIM_API cRunnableEnvir : public cEnvir
00732 {
00733   public:
